GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.34
GSD.description:
net: sfc: add missing xdp queue reinitialization

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit ed7a824fda8732578d1014fad1f7fb0363705090, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 3990a8fffbdad5765f47ea593f9de66c91762059. For more details please see the references link.
